title: Videos by Sharon Machlis for fun things

yaml.title: Videos by Sharon Machlis for fun things
yaml.image-alt: Illustration or logo for 'GIT for Humans', emphasizing a user-friendly, approachable interface to Git version control, often using icons like branches, commits, or human figures to represent simplicity and accessibility.

markdown.markdown: ![Buy me a coffee](https://cdn.buymeacoffee.com/buttons/bmc-new-btn-logo.svg){alt="Buy me a coffee" width="15" height="21"}Buy me a coffee ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Here is a list of video tutorials by Sharon for fun things to do with R that didn't fit in the other categories: 1. [How to send Text Messages?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3513359/how-to-send-text-messages-from-r.html) 2. [How to Slack from R?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3402657/how-to-slack-from-r.html) 3. [How to send email from r and gmail?](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3398701/how-to-send-email-from-r-and-gmail.html) 4. [Keep passwords and tokens secure with the keyring package](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8Cilx-MOsU&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=44) 5. [Schedule R scripts on a Mac](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w2Ka5u5jlJU&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=25) 6. Creating Studio addins or plugins: [Option 1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zAtf9NkSOUg&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=35) or [Option 2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=539uKwD6NKE&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=33) 7. [Run Python in R](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m_MAYRDIuN4&list=PL7D2RMSmRO9JOvPC1gbA8Mc3azvSfm8Vv&index=32) 8. [Create searchable Bluesky bookmarks with R](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3623509/create-searchable-bluesky-bookmarks-with-r.html) 9. [3 of the best LLM integration tools for R](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3828268/top-llm-integration-tools-for-r-programming.html) 10. [Create searchable Bluesky bookmarks with R](https://www.infoworld.com/article/3623509/create-searchable-bluesky-bookmarks-with-r.html) ![](featured.png)
